item.description:
Hello Boston,

BPO invites you to an exclusive & stylish Bollywood Night at Mantra Restaurant / Lounge on Friday, March 29th, 2013.

There is no better way to celebrate Holi weekend than to dance to the tunes played by the BIGGEST and the BEST Bollywood DJ in the East Coast, DeeJay Bunty. Get crazy with a fusion of nostalgia as Bunty remixes the classics and newest hits.

We have a special $15 cover for all those who RSVP via email and arrive before 11 PM. You can RSVP with your guest names to bpobollywood@gmail.com.

Please note we have limited spots and guests with RSVPâ€™s will be given priority.Bottle service and VIP tables are available. Email us for more info.

Mantra is located in the heart of downtown Boston, accessible to MBTA (Green, Red, Orange & Silver lines) and parking garages. Plenty of street parking is available if you arrive early.

Time: 10 PM to 2 AM.
Dress Code: No shorts/hats/t-shirts/sneakers. Dress to impress.

Don't forget to join us on Facebook (www.1bpo.org) to stay updated with all our events and early bird specials.

Best,

BPO
item.name: Rang De - Bollywood Night
